statements: SELECT * FROM decentralized_identity_system;
SELECT id, username, public_key FROM decentralized_identity_system ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, private_key FROM decentralized_identity_system WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM decentralized_identity_system WHERE blockchain_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT id, public_key, private_key FROM decentralized_identity_system ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM decentralized_identity_system WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT public_key, private_key FROM decentralized_identity_system WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM decentralized_identity_system WHERE blockchain_address = '0x3456789012345678';
SELECT username FROM decentralized_identity_system WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, blockchain_address FROM decentralized_identity_system ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, is_verified FROM blockchain_users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT public_key FROM blockchain_users WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM identity_credentials WHERE credential_type = 'email';
SELECT user_id, credential_type, credential_data FROM identity_credentials ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, public_key FROM blockchain_users WHERE is_verified = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_users WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM identity_credentials WHERE credential_type = 'Passport' ORDER BY credential_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, MAX(credential_id) FROM identity_credentials GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM identities WHERE identity_type = 'passport';
SELECT verification_type, verified FROM verifications WHERE identity_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, email, public_key FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM identities JOIN users ON identities.user_id = users.user_id WHERE identities.identity_type = 'passport';
SELECT verification_id, verification_type, verified FROM verifications WHERE verification_type = 'email_verification' AND verified = true;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM identities WHERE verified = TRUE;
SELECT attestation_id, attester_id, attestation_data FROM attestations WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM attestations GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, public_key FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, i.identity_data FROM users u JOIN identities i ON u.user_id = i.user_id;
SELECT a.*, r.revocation_reason FROM attestations a JOIN revocations r ON a.attestation_id = r.attestation_id WHERE r.revoked = TRUE;

SELECT u.username, i.identity_data, r.revoked FROM users u INNER JOIN identities i ON u.user_id = i.user_id LEFT JOIN revocations r ON i.identity_id = r.attestation_id WHERE r.revoked = FALSE AND u.user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM documents WHERE document_name LIKE '%contract%';
SELECT user_id, document_name FROM documents ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT requester_id, request_id FROM access_requests WHERE request_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id > 5;
SELECT username, public_key FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM documents ORDER BY document_name DESC, doc_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, document_name FROM documents WHERE doc_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND user_id = 5;
